about_the_game:
To thank the court gardeners for all their hard work in the bamboo garden, the Japanese Emperor rewards them with a new panda: it’s Miss Panda!
Good news! The newcomer doesn’t have much of an appetite. But in the spring you’ll have to work twice as hard to take care of the couple and their babies!

Special features:
• Miss Panda and her babies have arrived: when Miss Panda meets Mr Panda on a tile, you can soon expect to hear the pitter-patter of tiny paws. With your baby pandas, earn bonus points and gain the upper hand over your rivals!
• 18 new Objectives
• New Plot tiles to discover: the Celestial Pond, the Kamis garden, the Sacred Hills, and even the Garden Shed… Each new tile has its own special rules and could completely reverse the outcome of the game.
detailed_description:
To thank the court gardeners for all their hard work in the bamboo garden, the Japanese Emperor rewards them with a new panda: it’s Miss Panda!
Good news! The newcomer doesn’t have much of an appetite. But in the spring you’ll have to work twice as hard to take care of the couple and their babies!

Special features:
• Miss Panda and her babies have arrived: when Miss Panda meets Mr Panda on a tile, you can soon expect to hear the pitter-patter of tiny paws. With your baby pandas, earn bonus points and gain the upper hand over your rivals!
• 18 new Objectives
• New Plot tiles to discover: the Celestial Pond, the Kamis garden, the Sacred Hills, and even the Garden Shed… Each new tile has its own special rules and could completely reverse the outcome of the game.

name: Takenoko-Chibis

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit SP1
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E8400 or AMD Phenom II X2 550
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 630 or Radeon HD 6570
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad Q9400 or AMD Phenom II X4 940
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 460 or Radeon HD 4850

short_description: The gardeners are getting ready to receive a new panda in the bamboo gardens. But not just any panda: Miss Panda! Spring has arrived and the family is about to grow; gardening has never been so challenging...
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain
